ygData.subject: The Awakened
ygData.msgSnippet: Years and decades had passed. His inner circuitry, though it had stayed in passive mode for long, still counted the nanocycles passing away. Then there was a

Subject: The Awakened
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=225937926; y=EcKjFtG7ehbBgpRTVwfB5nhzTTLxzWgzs66uP7WAlhdtjahsfQBF
X-Yahoo-Profile: warriorazure

Years and decades had passed. His inner circuitry, though it had
stayed in passive mode for long, still counted the nanocycles passing
away. Then there was a small release signal, and activity slowly came
back. First the spark containment system started emitting data, then
the spark itself soon began to take control of its body, gradually,
until sensory input and kinetic response were up and running.

He realized that he was on a planetoid. The dusty ground beneath his
massive feet revealed that much. Seeing the blue and white planet far
away and analyzing the immediate data he could gather about it, he
realized he was on a Moon. The Moon. He was at Searing Eye, the base
where he, Unicron's Field General, would command the Great One's
armies and claim the shining jewel he saw.

He rose to a stand. Dozens of smaller machine crawled about and some
even climbed down from his enormous body. There was one who came and
stood, advancing on five spidery legs, and bowed deferently in front
of him.

- Greetings General Vorpal. The Great Lord has requested your
awakening. The time of war is approaching.

- I know. How is the construction of the base progressing?

- Very well, General. The trenches have been dug and we are currently
arrying the metallic crystals in them. It will all be ready before we
strike.

- That is well. Go now. I must be alone.

Silently, the drone walked away, and the General was alone with
himself. He looked intently at Earth's orb and called out...

- My brothers and sisters, hear me for I am the First Awakened of
Unicron's mighty armies! Join me! Come back to me and heed your
Master's unwavering call! Awaken, all of you!

OOC: This is Vorpal, the only Minion NPC who isn't a drone, and, at
the same time, the Minion Leader.
